TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed VBFixedStringAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Indicates that a string should be treated as if it were fixed length.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Visual Basic strings are of variable length by default. This attribute is useful when using Visual Basic file input and output functions such as `FileGet` and `FilePut` that require fixed length strings.
## Examples [!code-vb[VbCnAttributes#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbCnAttributes/VB/Class2.vb#23)]
> [!NOTE] > The `VBFixedStringAttribute` is informational and cannot be used to convert a variable length string to a fixed string. The purpose of this attribute is to modify how strings in structures and non-local variables are used by methods or API calls that recognize the `VBFixedStringAttribute`. Keep in mind that this attribute does not change the actual length of the string itself.
